FuncDef: This command creates a PIM policy or enters the context to configure a PIM policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the PIM policy name up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
Specifies the keyword used to create the PIM policy. The create keyword requirement can be enabled or disabled in the environment>create context.
